title: Asynchronous Online Arabic Foundation Course Design for Saudi Elementary Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: An elementary learner-targeted course in a Saudi culture-reflected language learning environment, utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations. Focuses on assessing practical language skills through project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: Learners communicate using over 50 basic Arabic vocabulary words in a VR environment based on Saudi daily life scenarios.
Learners collaboratively complete one language project reflecting cultural contexts with peer learners on an asynchronous discussion platform.
Learners accurately pronounce and use 20 daily expressions contextually using a smartphone-based AR app.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
